eudtrg.base.dataspec package¶

Submodules¶

eudtrg.base.dataspec.bytedump module¶

Defines Db class for uploading arbitary bytes data on SC memory.

class eudtrg.base.dataspec.bytedump.Db(content)¶

Bases: eudtrg.base.dataspec.eudobj.EUDObject

Object for uploading arbitary bytestream into starcraft memory. You can store bytes objects and reference to this object when you need its content. Useful for uploading custom resources into SC memory. One of the simplest EUDObjects.

GetDataSize()¶
GetDependencyList()¶
WritePayload(buf)¶

eudtrg.base.dataspec.eudobj module¶

Defines EUDObject, which means everything uploadable into SC memory.

class eudtrg.base.dataspec.eudobj.EUDObject¶

Bases: eudtrg.base.dataspec.expr.Expr

EUDObject is a base class for uploadable objects, which can be placed in starcraft memory after map loads. Derived class should implement three virtual methods:

  • GetDependencyList : Get list of objects/expressions object depends on.
  • GetDataSize : Get size of object. e.g. Trigger object’s size is 2408.
  • WritePayload : Write payload data into given buffer.
EvalImpl()¶

Returns nummerical value of this object. This function returns address of the object by default, but you may override this behavior.

GetDataSize()¶

Get size of object when it is uploaded into Starcraft memory.

GetDependencyList()¶

Get list of objects/expressions object depends on. eudtrg automatically traverses through objects, so object do not have to, and should not traverse through other objects. GetDependencyList should give complete list of objects which object directly depends on.

ResetAddress()¶

Returns address of object. Reset address for future usage. You should invalidate caches regarding EvalImpl, GetDependencyList, GetDataSize, WritePayload after this function is called.

SetAddress(address)¶

Set address of object. After this function is called, you can cache values of EvalImpl, GetDependencyList, GetDataSize, WritePayload.

WritePayload(emitbuffer)¶

Write payload data into given buffer. WritePayload can write data into emitbuffer using following functions

  • EmitByte : Emit byte. Byte should be constant
  • EmitWord : Emit words. Word should be constant
  • EmitDword : Emit dword. Dword can be either constant or expression.
  • EmitBytes : Emit bytes object.

eudtrg will raise RuntimeError if object writes more or less bytes than specified by GetDataSize.

eudtrg.base.dataspec.expr module¶

Expression library wrapper. Used for calculating expression with addreses. Internally used in eudtrg.

class eudtrg.base.dataspec.expr.Expr¶

Bases: builtins.object

Base class for expression containing address of objects. Any object derived from this class should implement these virtual methods:

  • GetDependencyList : Get list of expressions this expression depents on.
  • EvalImpl : Evaluate value of expressions.

eudtrg.base.dataspec.forward module¶

Forward declaration class Forward

class eudtrg.base.dataspec.forward.Forward¶

Bases: eudtrg.base.dataspec.expr.Expr

ex)

a = Trigger( nextptr = b ) # Error : b is not defined b = Trigger( nextptr = a )

->

b = Forward() # Forward declaration a = Trigger( nextptr = b ) b << Trigger( nextptr = a ) # put in value later.

eudtrg.base.dataspec.trigger module¶

Defines
  • Trigger scoping function
  • Trigger, Condition, Action class
  • Trigger linker (NextTrigger, LastTrigger)
  • Debug utility ( GetTriggerCount )
class eudtrg.base.dataspec.trigger.Action(locid1, strid, wavid, time, player1, player2, unitid, acttype, amount, flags)¶

Bases: eudtrg.base.dataspec.expr.Expr

Action class. Immutable in python. See eudtrg.base.stocktrg for stock actions. You won’t be manipulating this class directly if you’re only using stock triggers, but you’ll need to know in which offset each field will be stored.

+00 locid1 | dword0 | EPD(act)+0 +04 strid | dword1 | EPD(act)+1 +08 wavid | dword2 | EPD(act)+2 +0C time | dword3 | EPD(act)+3 +10 player1 | dword4 | EPD(act)+4 +14 player2 | dword5 | EPD(act)+5 +18 unitid | dword6 | EPD(act)+6 +1A acttype | | +1B amount | | +1C flags | dword7 | EPD(act)+7 +1D internal[3] | |
Disable()¶
Evaluate()¶
GetDependencyList()¶

class eudtrg.base.dataspec.trigger.Condition(locid, player, amount, unitid, comparison, condtype, restype, flags)¶

Bases: eudtrg.base.dataspec.expr.Expr

Condition class. Immutable in python. See eudtrg.base.stocktrg for stock conditions. You won’t be manipulating this class directly if you’re only using stock triggers, but you’ll need to know in which offset each field will be stored.

+00 locid | dword0 | EPD(cond)+0 +04 player | dword1 | EPD(cond)+1 +08 amount | dword2 | EPD(cond)+2 +0C unitid | dword3 | EPD(cond)+3 +0E comparison | | +0F condtype | | +10 restype | dword4 | EPD(cond)+4 +11 flags | | +12 internal[2] | |

eudtrg.base.dataspec.trigger.Disabled(item)¶

Make condition/action disabled. ex)

Disabled(SetDeaths(Player1, SetTo, 1234, ‘Terran Marine’))
eudtrg.base.dataspec.trigger.GetTriggerCount()¶

Counts how many trigger objects have been constructed since eudtrg have been initalized. Useful for debugging simple errors. ex) I made a function with about 1000 triggers expected.

GetTriggerCount has changed only by 3 -> Bug.
eudtrg.base.dataspec.trigger.LastTrigger(Expr)¶
class eudtrg.base.dataspec.trigger.NextTrigger¶

Bases: eudtrg.base.dataspec.expr.Expr

Create reference to next declared trigger. Makes your code cleaner.

Evaluate()¶
GetDependencyList()¶
SetTrigger(trg)¶
eudtrg.base.dataspec.trigger.PopTriggerScope()¶

Exits trigger scope. Used in conjunction with PushTriggerScope().

eudtrg.base.dataspec.trigger.PushTriggerScope()¶

Creates trigger scope. Triggers inside the scope is isolated from outside. Used in conjunction with PopTriggerScope().

ex) a = Trigger() PushTriggerScope() b = Trigger() c = Trigger() PopTriggerScope() d = Trigger()

Result : a->d, b->c. Inside and outside of scope is isolated.
